name: Easy Product Catalog
author: CoreFortress

sections.description:
If you own an ecommerce website or want to have a small shop section on your site, you need to try out our Product Catalog plugin. It promises the best experience both for users and website owners.

We have created a plugin which is simple in use even for beginners on WordPress. The plugin has all the functionality one needs wrapped up with best looking views.

Adding products photos, descriptions, brand, articul and other info, is the main functionality of the plugin. Product Catalog is very user friendly and responsive. We also took care of it’s simplicity in design.

You are going to enjoy adding new products and displaying the current ones with our plugin.
